title: How Safe Is Your Job? (Rebroadcast)
description: Economists preach the gospel of "creative destruction," whereby new industries -- and jobs -- replace the old ones. But has creative destruction become too destructive?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
